item.title: Essential Coding Skills and Tricks in Java
item.description: Essential Coding Skills and Tricks in Java Data Structure Operation Array Array is a consecutive allocated memory space, no overhead It’s size is fixed. 它是mutable类型可以直接在原来位置进行CURD Iterate an array from left to right for (int i = 0; i < array.length; i++) Iterate an array from right to left for (int i = array.length - 1; i >= 0; i++) Iterate an array custom step
